|rad1oui = 00:11:50 |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3028-001424" and "28-000174" is silkscreened on the board. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=25199 On the DD-WRT forums] (internal and label shots)
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Belkin_F5D7230-4_v2000%2Cv2000de_%2B_Belkin_F5D7231-4_v1102%2Cv1003ee%2C_and_v1103uk On the DD-WRT wiki] [http://hi.baidu.com/broadcom/blog/item/317ab383b12c20ae0cf4d29c.html Internals and label of an unknown F5D7231-4 version on this Baidu blog]
:Appears to share the same PCB as this version. The FCC ID on the label (PD5F5D72314) is under the Delta Networks grantee code (appears to be in error) [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=49146&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15 Label and mention of an unknown version on the DD-WRT forums] :Same label as above ==Pictures==
